headline: A Look At Eversource Energy (ES) Valuation After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: Eversource Energy (ES) has drawn fresh attention after recent share price gains, with the stock up around 8% over the past month and about 13% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Eversource Energy. That recent strength builds on a 1 month share price return of about 8% and a 3 month share price return of roughly 13%. The 1 year total shareholder return of 23.4% points to momentum that has been building rather than fading. If Eversource’s move has you looking across the...
